content: Theres no search on backdropcms.org? Wanted to search the blog posts but dont see a search field. Am I blind?
Search is enabled (https://backdropcms.org/search) but we must be missing a block...

https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/370

Add search box into header, test & style search results pages 路 Issue #370 路 backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
As part of the new home page design, there is a search box in our header. We don't currently use the site search for anything other than the handbook - if we want this to be a site-wide search ...
